thread.title: Watch Steve Coogan interview himself on his 50th birthday
thread.title_full: Watch Steve Coogan interview himself on his 50th birthday

title: Watch Steve Coogan interview himself on his 50th birthday
text:
Watch Steve Coogan interview himself on his 50th birthday Watch Steve Coogan interview himself on his 50th birthday 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Steve Coogan celebrates his 50th birthday today, and to mark the milestone, he has done an interview â€“ with himself. 
In the five-minute-long interview, which follows the publication of his new autobiography Easily Distracted, the Alan Partridge star tackles subjects such as speaking his mind, meeting the Pope and how he feels about turning 50. 
He also talks about his childhood, the Leveson Inquiry, his Bafta wins and what fans can expect from his book. Share article 
Fans are also in for a treat as he does a bit of singing, and gives himself some sage advice. Promoted Stories
